app_descript:
Helicopter Escape 3D

Brief:

Fasten your seatbelts for the adrenaline-pumping action of "Helicopter Escape 3D", the thrilling shooter that places you in the heroic role of a rescuer on a perilous mission. Navigate a city overrun by danger, using high-powered weaponry to protect hostages from relentless pursuers, crafting a path of destruction to ensure their safety. Dive into this action-packed title that offers a perfect escape for those seeking intense, 3D shooting fun.
